description: I like setting the KERDI-DRAIN before my pan. This allows me to focus on plumbing, get the drain level, and set it to the correct height. Then I set the shower pan and waterproof everything. When you join our Video Library today you'll also get our Beginner Walk-In Shower Plumbing Course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Install KERDI-DRAIN Before Shower Pan - #shorts #homerepairtutor
